title: How is PYKE playable in other regions but not in australia
body: If i was to start youtubing. I wont be able to upload gameplay with PYKE before the other youtubers do. By the time he becomes free in aus, about 1000 vids of pyke has been released. Can we get champions unlock at the same time for every region plz.

replies.body: Will it ever come to the Oceania Server? Pls I hope so I really want to play him
Assuming there's no major bugs or balance issues he'll most likely come to the live servers next patch.
Really ohh thank god I really wanted to try him so much
mate they are playing on the PBE

Pyke isn't available anywhere but the PBE, there is ONE PBE server and it's in NA region.

Plenty of Australians get access to the PBE and deal with the 300ping.
